attributes.action: put pressure on Transport for London to abolish free bus travel for under 19s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The introduction of free bus travel for children in London has resulted in greatly increased overcrowding on London's buses, and an associated increase in anti-social behaviour, by youths who often get the bus for short journeys that are within easy walking distance.

This is, at best, incredibly annoying, and at its worst makes buses a "no go area", especially when the children are on their way to and from school.

In addition, the cost of providing this concession is being covered by fares revenue.

We therefore urge the Prime Minister to put pressure on Transport for London to abolish this disastrous scheme as soon as is practicable.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
